name: Umang Software Technologies
overview:
UMANG SOFTWARE TECHNOLOGIES is an Offshore Software Development Company providing IT services and solutions to clients worldwide. UMANG is located in Margao, the commercial capital of Goa, India. Formed in 2009, UMANG is registered under the Software Technology Parks of India(STPI).

We offer… Software Product Development, Custom Application Development and Maintenance (CADM), Web Development and Design,IT Staffing, Hiring of Dedicated Software Professionals ,Version Migration and Consulting Services to our valuable clients. Having worked on various domains such as Banking and Finance, Marine Research, GPS Solutions, Pharmaceutical Software Solutions, Point Of Sales (POS), Customer Relationship Management (CRM), Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP), etc. Our Programmers are proficient in technologies such as Microsoft DotNet, Borland Delphi, Visual Basic and databases including MYSQL, Postgres SQL, SQL Server, Sybase, Advantage and Oracle.

Information technology industry is a fast growing industry and with massive changes in the technologies and increasing demand for automation, we are constantly in the process of updating our software skills by adopting new and emerging technologies.
